entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:33 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 12:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
